attributes.action: Stop Boris Johnson suspending parliament to force through no-deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Politicians are voicing concerns due to strong doubts over Brexit in general, and in particular Brexit without a deal with our largest trading partner - The EU. If the consequence is that Brexit cannot be achieved then so be it. But under no circumstances should we remove the say of our democratically elected politicians. Sign this petition to urge The Queen to reject Boris Johnson’s request.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has asked The Queen to suspend Parliament in order to push through a no-deal Brexit. ‘Proroguing’ Parliament will remove any obstacle in leading Britain into the uncertainty of Brexit without a deal.
